attr.title: Detective Case and Clown Bot in: The Express Killer
attr.desc: Join Detective Case and his quirky sidekick Clown Bot in a comedic investigation filled with mystery, humor, and retro charm. It is a classic point-and-click adventure game featuring engaging puzzles, witty dialogue, and a fun narrative.
attr.desc_md: Join Detective Case and his quirky sidekick Clown Bot in a comedic investigation filled with mystery, humor, and retro charm. It is a classic point-and-click adventure game featuring engaging puzzles, witty dialogue, and a fun narrative.
attr.inst: Buy the game and download the Windows version. Copy files into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md:
* Buy the game and download the Windows version from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/711920/Detective_Case_and_Clown_Bot_in_The_Express_Killer)
* Copy the game files into assets folder
